trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_000<tab>Settled in, are ye? Good for you. I'd like nothin' more than to board the first boat back to Eorzea, but no use pinin' for liberation what ain't about to come.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_001<tab>This debt o' mine'll keep me shackled to this place for the foreseeable future, I reckon. Anyroad, ye got that protean crystal I've been waitin' for? Good.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_002<tab>Aye, this'll do...though I'll need more than just the one─an' I'll only be able to work with weapons or gear o' the sort as made for practitioners o' certain powerful arts...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_003<tab>But I'll work like a dog if I have to! For yer sake an' mine! An' then we can both bugger off this bloody rock an' go somewhere every livin' thing ain't tryin' to kill us!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>You may now create and augment Eureka gear and arms. To begin, you will need to provide Gerolt with the requisite level 70 antiquated items and protean crystals.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_010<tab>So, what'll it be? Arms or armor?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_000_001<tab>Create or augment Eureka gear. (<var 2D ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_000_002<tab>Augment +2 Eureka weapons. (<var 2D ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_000_003<tab>Create or augment Eureka gear. (DoW)
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_100_003<tab>Create or augment Eureka gear. (DoM)
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_110_003<tab>Exchange Anemos crystals.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_000_004<tab>Learn about Eureka weapons and gear.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A1_000_005<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_020<tab>Love to oblige ye, but a horde o' protean crystals won't suffice if I'm to cobble together somethin' truly astoundin'.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_030<tab>An' besides, ye haven't even got a suitable arm for me to work with! Maybe set yer sights a little lower before shootin' for the stars, aye?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_100_031<tab>To proceed, you must first acquire <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8030202 /var> to augment.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>To proceed, you must first acquire <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var> to augment.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_040<tab>What exactly do I need, ye ask? Can't rightly say, but I'll know it when I see it. Somethin' bleedin' rare, I reckon. Come an' see me when ye think ye've found somethin' suitable.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_100_041<tab>To augment <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>, you will need to procure something other than protean crystals. Speak with other players and share information to discover how to proceed!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>To augment <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>, you will need to procure something other than protean crystals. Speak with other players and share information to discover how to proceed!
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_100_040<tab>Don't tell me...ye've found it, haven't ye!? That special thing I've been waitin' for! Give it over─let me see!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_110_040<tab>...Pazuzu's feathers? Aye, they'll do just fine...but I'll need more than what ye've got. Sorry to get yer hopes up─but at least ye know what yer lookin' for, eh?

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_050<tab>Don't tell me...ye've found it, haven't ye!? That special thing I've been waitin' for. An' in sufficient quantities, no less! Give 'em over─the weapon too!
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_060<tab>Muahahaha... MUAHAHAHAHAHA! Just you wait, friend! Yer in for a show!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_070<tab>It's done! I've harnessed the essence of Anemos an' created the very pinnacle o' what this bastard region's got to offer! I give ye...<var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> an' <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_080<tab>It's done! I've harnessed the essence of Anemos an' created the very pinnacle o' what this bastard region's got to offer! I give ye...<var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_090<tab>An' with that, I've discharged a good chunk o' my debt to the harridan! Not nearly enough to get me off this bloody rock but hells, it's somethin'! Huzzah! Huzzah for incremental progress!
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_Q2_000_000<tab>Select a job.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_MENU_JOB<tab><var 2B ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Cancel.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you ask about?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A4_000_001<tab>Creating and augmenting Eureka gear and weapons.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A4_000_002<tab>Augmenting +2 Eureka weapons.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A4_100_002<tab>Exchanging Anemos crystals.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_A4_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_100<tab>Eh? What's there to ask? If ye want to stand a fightin' chance against the beasties o' this rock, ye'll want me to strengthen yer arms an' armor!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Gerolt can create Eureka gear and weapons if you provide him with the requisite level 70 antiquated items and protean crystals. He can also augment these creations further with additional protean crystals.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>If you do not possess level 70 antiquated gear or weapons, you may purchase them from the Calamity salvagers located in Limsa Lominsa, Gridania, and Ul'dah.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_110<tab>Don't go puttin' the cart before the chocobo. If ye want somethin' that bleedin' powerful, ye'll need to provide somethin' bleedin' powerful. An' protean crystals won't be enough either...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>To augment +2 Eureka weapons, you will need to procure something other than protean crystals. Speak with other players and share information to discover how to proceed!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_GEROLT_000_120<tab>I'll toss a few protean crystals yer way in exchange for any Anemos crystals ye don't need. How many? Well, that's for me to decide after I give 'em a good look. If that's not to yer likin', then piss off.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1SPWEAPON_00450_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>Gerolt will give you a random quantity of protean crystals in exchange for Anemos crystals.
